column4: Itś for my sweethearts convience, the auto login, but when I use it, I normally set it to pause to give me a chance to login, but I think to new gdm has a bug becuse I see the login square but no box to fill in user name and pass word.
your keyboard layout appears to be doing weird stuff (like showing "itś" instead of "it's"
